outline:
1. copper, bronze
    1. copper (ore), bronze (as copper alloy)
    2. fetters (of copper or bronze)
    3. copper (as value)
  2. lust, harlotry
    1. meaning dubious
kjv_def: brasen, brass, chain, copper, fetter (of brass), filthiness, steel.
strongs_def: copper, hence, something made of that metal, i.e. coin, a fetter; figuratively, base (as compared with gold or silver)
